column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Melody Thomas Scott
#Text=:
#Text=Like it or not , reality television is enjoying its trend right now .
#Text=It 's in a category of its own and ca n't really be compared to our show or any other daytime drama .
#Text=I love my Survivor and real-life crime shows as much as the next guy , but I do n't see it as a conflict of viewer choices .
#Text=The only event I can think of that had a huge impact in the ratings was the O.J. Simpson trial .
#Text=Everyone was glued to their televisions to watch that circus .
#Text=Unfortunately , all of daytime programming took a huge hit , with some viewers never returning to their soaps .
#Text=But that was across the board and affected all of the programming at that time .
#Text=Michelle Stafford
#Text=:
#Text=I do n't think it 's bad for business because we are still employed , and it does n't seem to be affecting us .
#Text=I do n't watch those shows so I ca n't have too much of an opinion on them .
#Text=Tricia Cast
#Text=: Yes , I said it 20 years ago on the Donahue show .
#Text=We 're lucky to have jobs because reality programming is a threat to scripted shows everywhere .
#Text=Mike Halterman
#Text=: What do you feel is the one major reason for the show staying at the top of the ratings for 19 years ?
#Text=Do you feel you contributed to the show 's ratings strength in some fashion ?
#Text=Melody Thomas Scott
#Text=: Ed Scott .
#Text=Now I can finally say it ! [ editor 's note :
#Text=Ed Scott is the former producer of Y&R , and Melody Thomas Scott 's husband ]

#Text=Of course without the individual excellence of our writing staff , performers , and every other area such as set decoration , lighting , camera work , etc. , it would n't get the viewers ' attention .
#Text=The contributions of all the talented people we are lucky enough to have makes our show the unique piece of art that it is .
#Text=Synergy !
#Text=Michelle Stafford
#Text=: Oh God , yes , of course ! [ laughs ]
#Text=No.
#Text=It 's a group thing .
#Text=It 's a group endeavor for a show like this .
#Text=One person does n't carry it .
#Text=I think not a lot people leave the show .
#Text=The production value is really great .
#Text=There are extremely talented people who work on our show and I 'm not just talking about actors , I 'm talking about the crew [ as well ] .
#Text=Tricia Cast
#Text=: As a whole the show sparkles .
#Text=The Young and the Restless is the best show on daytime .
#Text=It 's been number one with and without me .
#Text=Mike Halterman
#Text=: Do you feel Y&R , through its longevity and popularity , has influenced other shows ?
#Text=Melody Thomas Scott
#Text=: One would think so , but I have not yet seen another show equal to our production values .
#Text=I think they have tried , but have not succeeded .
#Text=Maybe they just do n't know how !
